metadata.title: CVE-2022-23133 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authenticated user can create a hosts group from the configuration withXSS payload, which will be available for other users. When XSS is stored byan authenticated malicious actor and other users try to search for groupsduring new host creation, the XSS payload will fire and the actor can stealsession cookies and perform session hijacking to impersonate users or takeover their accounts.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
